name: Handling Gambling
description:
Controls:

A/D - move left/right

Left Mouse Button - Chargable Launch

If you broke the game - ctrl+R

Premise:

You are trying to make the die land on certain numbers by moving around in it. The number on the top left shows what the current number is facing up, and this number has a timer. When the timer goes out, that is the final number the die landed on.

This game is pretty scuffed, but I find the gameplay unique. The red guy bought you to cheat his way through some gambling with his blue friend. As they yell out they predictions, it is up to you who will win (two endings).

I drew the art and made the sound effects, the great music is by Pedro:
